eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Has T2DM
* Has HbA1c between 6.5% (48 mmol/mol) and 8.0% (64 mmol/mol) on stable dose(s) of antihyperglycemic agent(s), including insulin
* Has pre-existing cardiovascular disease

Exclusion Criteria:

* Has a history of type 1 diabetes mellitus or ketoacidosis.
* Is not able to take sitagliptin

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With First Confirmed Cardiovascular (CV) Event of Major Adverse Cardiovascular Event (MACE) Plus (Per Protocol Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Primary composite CV endpoint of MACE plus which includes CV-related death, nonfatal MI, nonfatal stroke, or unstable angina requiring hospitalization.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With First Confirmed CV Event of Major Adverse Cardiovascular Event (MACE) Plus (Intent to Treat Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Primary composite CV endpoint of MACE plus which includes CV-related death, nonfatal MI, nonfatal stroke, or unstable angina requiring hospitalization.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With First Confirmed CV Event of MACE (Per Protocol Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: CV composite endpoint of MACE which includes CV-related death, nonfatal MI, or nonfatal stroke.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With First Confirmed CV Event of MACE (Intent to Treat Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: CV composite endpoint of MACE which includes CV-related death, nonfatal MI, or nonfatal stroke.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Incidence of All-cause Mortality (Per Protocol Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent incidence of all-cause mortality is reported as the percentage of participants who died due to any cause.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Incidence of All-cause Mortality (Intent to Treat Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent incidence of all-cause mortality is reported as the percentage of participants who died due to any cause.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Incidence of Congestive Heart Failure (CHF) Requiring Hospitalization (Per Protocol Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent incidence of CHF requiring hospitalization was reported as the percentage of participants who were admitted to the hospital for CHF.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Incidence of CHF Requiring Hospitalization (Intent to Treat Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent incidence of CHF requiring hospitalization was reported as the percentage of participants who were admitted to the hospital for CHF.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Renal Function Over Time (Per Protocol Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in renal function based on estimated glomerular filtration rate \[eGFR\] using the Modification of Diet in Renal Disease \[MDRD\] method.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Renal Function Over Time (Intent to Treat Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in renal function based on eGFR using the MDRD method.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in HbA1c Over Time (Per Protocol Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: HbA1c is a measure of the percentage of glycated hemoglobin in the blood. Estimated mean difference between sitagliptin and placebo controlling for baseline HbA1c and region.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in HbA1c Over Time (Intent to Treat Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: HbA1c is a measure of the percentage of glycated hemoglobin in the blood. Estimated mean difference between sitagliptin and placebo controlling for baseline HbA1c and region.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Urine Albumin:Creatinine Ratio Over Time (Per Protocol Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline reflects the difference between the urine albumin:creatinine ratio reported time point and baseline value.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Urine Albumin:Creatinine Ratio Over Time (Intent to Treat Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline reflects the difference between the urine albumin:creatinine ratio reported time point and baseline value.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants Who Initiated Chronic Insulin Therapy (Per Protocol Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Chronic insulin therapy is defined as a continuous period of insulin use of more than 3 months.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants Who Initiated Chronic Insulin Therapy (Intent to Treat Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: Chronic insulin therapy is defined as a continuous period of insulin use of more than 3 months.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Initiation of Co-interventional Agent (Per Protocol Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: In participants not receiving insulin at baseline, time to addition of first co-interventional agent (i.e., next oral antihyperglycemic agent \[AHA\] or chronic insulin, where chronic insulin therapy is defined as a continuous period of insulin use of more than 3 months.)

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Initiation of Co-interventional Agent (Intent to Treat Population)
outcomeMeasures.description: In participants not receiving insulin at baseline, time to addition of first co-interventional agent (i.e., next oral AHA or chronic insulin, where chronic insulin therapy is defined as a continuous period of insulin use of more than 3 months.)
